sentences.english: It can fetch relief in both conjunctivitis and glaucoma.
sentences.chinese: 它可以取救濟兩種結膜炎和青光眼。

sentences.english: Viral conjunctivitis can spread to the cornea, the white of the eye.
sentences.chinese: 病毒性結膜炎可以蔓延到角膜，白色的眼睛。

sentences.english: These eyedrops are very effective in treating conjunctivitis.
sentences.chinese: 這種眼藥水對治療結膜炎很有效。

sentences.english: Bacterial conjunctivitis is a microbial infection involving the mucous membrane on the surface of the eye.
sentences.chinese: 細菌性結膜炎是一種影響眼表粘膜的微生物感染。

sentences.english: Antihistaminic agents may control the atropine conjunctivitis.
sentences.chinese: 這種由阿托品引起的結膜炎，可用抗組胺類藥物控制。

sentences.english: Terramycin is another medication used to treat conjunctivitis.
sentences.chinese: 土黴素用於治療結膜炎另一種藥物。

sentences.english: Objective:To confirm the clinicopathologic changes of the fornix in vernal conjunctivitis.
sentences.chinese: 證明春季結膜炎在穹窿結膜的臨牀病理。

sentences.english: Give me a bottke of Chkoromycetinand one bottke of Ofkoxacin eye drop, appkicabke for conjunctivitis.
sentences.chinese: 給我來一瓶氯黴素和氧氟沙星眼藥水，能治結膜炎的。

sentences.english: Most patients with allergic conjunctivitis in children are vernal keratoconjunctivitis.
sentences.chinese: 兒童過敏性結膜炎以春季角結膜炎爲主。

sentences.english: Most patients with allergic conjunctivitis in children are vernal keratoconjunctivitis.
sentences.chinese: 兒童過敏性結膜炎以春季角結膜炎爲主。

sentences.english: Sharing face towels is a great way to get conjunctivitis, the infection also known as pinkeye .
sentences.chinese: 分享面巾是一個讓結膜炎感染的有效的途徑。

sentences.english: There are two main types of conjunctivitis allergic and infective .
sentences.chinese: 主要有兩種類型的結膜炎過敏性和傳染性。
您患的是急性傳染性結膜炎。

sentences.english: Conjunctivitis and sore and so has a good anti-inflammatory role of detoxification.
sentences.chinese: 結膜炎及瘡毒等具有很好的消炎解毒的作用。

sentences.english: Viral conjunctivitis is an infection of the mucous membrane of the surface of the eye.
sentences.chinese: 病毒性結膜炎也是眼表粘膜的一種感染。

definition: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
